name: Re:Claim
description:
An exploration-adventure game with low/no combat about exploring and (re)conquering a dark and scary world, and possibly yourself.

‘I don't know who or where I am. But looking around, somehow I know this is my world. That looks appropriate; it's bleak, scary, desolate, and it wants to kill me. Sounds about right.’

Created for the 2022 Mental Health Game Jam. The game experience is based on what it's like to be depressed, and the gameplay focuses on reframing your thoughts and feelings.
